text:
The Khaar'paal ("magebloods" in [[Goblin]]) are a [[kobold]] culture found in fortified tunnels across the [[Graywall Mountains]] between [[Breland]] and [[Droaam]]. Khaar'paal kobolds have an innate talent for [[arcane magic]], and many [[sorcerer]]s can be found among them. They do not work metal, but they have talented [[magewright]]s who make use of spells like [[mending]], [[prestidigitation]], [[magecraft]], and [[continual flame]], and work with exotic materials like [[quickstone]] and [[wyvern]] hide. Their [[wand]]s may night be as well-tooled as those produced by House [[Cannith]], but the Khaar'paal scouts are [[wandslinger]]s as capable as any [[Brelish|Breland]] dragoon.

The [[Droaam]] [[warlord]] [[Kethelrax the Cunning]] is a Khaar'paal [[kobold]].
title: Khaar'paal
